skills.name: Scarlet Spirit
skills.description: When dealing damage to ignited enemies or enemies with Firebrand, there is a 20% chance of dealing 300% ATK of Fire DMG. This effect has a minimum trigger cooldown of 1.5s for each enemy.

skills.name: Red Song
skills.description: Completely blocks an attack when being attacked by ignited enemies or enemies with Firebrand. Effect triggers every 40.0s. Character gains 20.0% All Elemental DMG and gains 20.0% Fire DMG.
